content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
The lab is designed for conducting research. 
- Currently, it is not receiving power, which is necessary for its operation.

### Steam engine at position(-18.5, 19.5)
The steam engine is used to generate electricity. 
- It is connected to a boiler and requires a power connection to function properly.

### Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0)
The boiler is used to convert water into steam for the steam engine.
- It is currently out of fuel and requires coal to operate.

### Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)
The offshore pump is used to draw water from a body of water for the boiler.
- It is currently operational and connected to the water supply.

### PipeGroup at position(-18.5, 16.5)
This group of pipes is used to transport fluids between the offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine.
- It is essential for the fluid connections between these entities.

### Electricity group at position(-16.5, 19.5)
This group consists of small electric poles that are intended to distribute electricity.
- Currently, it is not effectively powering the steam engine and lab.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
-  Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
-  Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
-  Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
-  Beltgroup (position ) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to power connections
- Ensure that all structures requiring power, such as the lab and steam engine, are properly connected to the power grid. Check the connections to small electric poles.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to fuel supply
- Ensure that the boiler is adequately supplied with coal or other fuel sources to operate. Check inventory levels before attempting to use the boiler.
